text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse @FoxNews Doesn't really look like that for you is about lives... As you don't even know what's the real situation in your own country. Most of the people dying for the Covid-19 are in USA. Don't use the excuse "it is a big country, proportionally is equal to.." People must stay isolated
